abstract: Charles O. Prince III just can’t seem to escape the real-estate slowdown. The former chief executive of Citigroup, ousted last year amid the troubles emanating from the bursting of the mortgage bubble, is now finding it hard to flush out a buyer for his own home, Bloomberg News reports.
lead_paragraph: Charles O. Prince III just can’t seem to escape the real-estate slowdown. The former chief executive of Citigroup, ousted last year amid the troubles emanating from the bursting of the mortgage bubble, is now finding it hard to flush out a buyer for his own home, Bloomberg News reports.

headline.main: New Housing Woes for Ex-Citi Chief
